text:
@SaraCarterDC CNN's Expert Coronavirus Panel To Include Greta Thunberg?

CNN is trying to revamp itself and up it's game.

Their internals reflections of their present staff have made them realize they are lacking.

She will be a ratings bonanza for CNN Zombies
